name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Python Developer with 13+ years of experience in web application development, specializing in **Python** and **Microservices** architecture. Expertise in building high-performance applications, backed by proficiency in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and CI/CD tools like **Jenkins**. Demonstrated capability in managing relational databases and implementing scalable solutions. Proven track record in creating robust applications in compliance with industry standards, aligning with practices that ensure code quality and scalability. Skilled in deploying cloud-native applications leveraging **AWS** and **Azure**, complemented by a solid foundation in **RabbitMQ** for message brokering and **Prometheus** for monitoring and alerting. Strong background in the healthcare and financial industries, with hands-on experience in **AI/ML** platforms using **FastAPI**, ensuring real-time processing and predictive analytics.

Designed and implemented **Microservices** architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (version 1.21)**, enabling scalable and fault-tolerant deployments that improved system uptime by 25%.
Created comprehensive CI/CD workflows incorporating **Jenkins** and **Prometheus** for monitoring and automated deployment, significantly reducing delivery timelines to under 2 weeks for major releases.
Managed and optimized **Relational Databases** ensuring robust data management with PostgreSQL, which improved data retrieval times by 40% across applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to architect web applications that align with business needs, driving a user satisfaction score increase of over 20% through responsive design and scalability.
Led the modernization of legacy systems, transitioning them into microservice-based architectures that facilitated integrations with various cloud services and tools.
Contributed to the development of deployment strategies utilizing **Consul** for service discovery and configuration management, enhancing system reliability and speed of service deployment.
Integrated messaging solutions using **RabbitMQ**, ensuring consistent and reliable communication between microservices, which improved processing speed by 15%.
Participated in code reviews and implemented robust testing strategies leveraging unit testing and integration frameworks to safeguard application quality and integrity.
Documented architectural designs and system functionalities, providing clarity and direction for team members and stakeholders, leading to a decrease in project onboarding time by 35%.

- Developed and maintained microservices architecture using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to enhance scalability and performance of core financial platforms for high-volume transactions.

- Implemented ETL pipelines for financial data processing with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, optimizing both batch and real-time data ingestion from multiple sources.
- Created and deployed containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated using **Kubernetes**, promoting consistent environments and easier deployments.
- Established monitoring and alerting solutions with **Prometheus**, ensuring high availability and performance of services across production systems.

- Led the deployment of CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins**, resulting in a **30%** improvement in deployment speed and a significant reduction in operational overhead.
- Conducted performance tuning and optimization of relational databases, supporting application responsiveness and efficiency during peak usage periods.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define best practices and improve code quality, resulting in a **25%** reduction in bugs and performance issues after release.

Utilized **Python** and microservices architecture to design and optimize scalable web applications for a global e-commerce platform, enhancing performance and maintainability.
Leveraged **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for effective containerization and orchestration, ensuring seamless deployment pipelines and high availability for critical services.
Engineered reliable messaging systems using **RabbitMQ** to enhance communication between microservices, facilitating efficient data handling and processing workflows across the application.
Developed and maintained relational databases handling over **1 million** transactions per day, utilizing technology stacks such as **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL** for efficient and fault-tolerant data access.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** to automate testing and deployment processes, reducing lead times for new features and updates by **30%**.
Monitored application metrics and performance with **Prometheus**, ensuring proactive issue detection and system health assessment, leading to an **uptime** increase by **99.9%**.
Applied best practices in web application development using modern frameworks, ensuring responsive and accessible UIs to maintain a quality user experience.
Created documentation for architectural designs and API specifications, promoting knowledge sharing within the development team for **10+** ongoing projects.
